Room.Name: Adamantine Dragon's Cave
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the giant cavern which the Adamantine Dragon calls home.
Room.LongDescription: The Adamantine Dragon is perhaps the greatest dragon in the land, but because she is still so young, her powers of magic are not yet fully developed. But even at this point, Elise is considered a master of magic and wizardry. The Adamantine Dragon may someday be more powerful than the Platinum Dragon. Although this cave is huge, the Adamantine Dragon will grow larger with age and will one day fill it completely.
